movie_title: Does being taller mean you earn more at work?  6 Minute English
introduction:
Improve your English vocabulary and speaking with 6 Minute English!
Does being taller mean you earn

vocabulary.definition: discrimination or unequal treatment based on a person's height
vocabulary.example: Shorter people often face heightism in the workplace, affecting their job opportunities and promotions.

vocabulary.definition: to not give someone what they are entitled to; to be cheated
vocabulary.example: The customers felt shortchanged when they received less change than they were owed at the store.

vocabulary.definition: to enjoy greatly; to take great pleasure in something
vocabulary.example: She relishes the opportunity to travel and explore new cultures.

vocabulary.definition: to exaggerate or make something seem better than it is
vocabulary.example: Some job applicants tend to embellish their resumes to make their qualifications appear stronger.

vocabulary.definition: an additional benefit or advantage; extra value placed on something
vocabulary.example: The premium for organic products is often justified by the higher quality and health benefits they offer.

vocabulary.definition: a difference or inequality, especially in terms of salaries, opportunities, or treatment
vocabulary.example: There is a notable disparity in pay between employees with the same qualifications but different genders.
